channel.title: Remake Sword (Preview) What you think now?
channel.description:
Ok now I remade the base of it What you guys think?
Questions for this _______________________ JUST GOT A QUESTION BEFORE I MAKE IT 3D... Exactly how do you do that? just make parallel lines from the base?
[b]How do I move the whole model so It's sticking straight up[/b]
THINGS TO DO AGAIN ____________________________ [b]3D COLORS MORE DETAIL POSSIBLY Depends on what you guys think[/b]
[IMG]http://i37.tinypic.com/25fokme.jpg[/img]
Any better?
[b]STILL GOT TO MAKE 3D PLEASE ANSWER ABOVE[/b]
Thanks,
Anyone got suggestions on adding to it?
